name: Adams Adventures
description:
This is a game in early development and I would love to get your opinion on the level design and gameplay!

The controls are as follow:

  • Level 1: Click anywhere to jump.
  • Level 2: Hold anywhere to go up, release to go down.
  • Level 3: Click once to jump and click once more to double jump.
  • Level 4: Press on the left side of the screen to go up, release to go down and Click the right side of the screen to dash through obstacles.
  • Level 5: Click on the left side of the screen for jump and double jump, Click on the right side of the screen to Slide

Hope you enjoy the game and please give your feedback so I can improve the game.

Cheers!
